title: Holding you, Holding me
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When your love is slow
Hits me and I'm fading
In backyard waterfalls
At night when it's raining
[Chorus]
Holding you, holding me
Kissing forever, we'll fall together
Holding you, holding me
Kissing, you're all I tasted
[Verse 2]
When it gets hot
The breeze is hitting slowly
And I get high
On every word you told me
[Chorus]
Holding you, holding me
Kissing forever, we'll fall together
Holding you, holding me
Kissing, you're all I tasted
[Bridge]
Give me just a little more,  just a little more,  just a little more to calm me
Give me just a littlе more,  just a little more,  just a littlе more to calm me

[Verse 3]
Your love is slow
Hits me and I'm fading
In waterfalls
At night when it's raining
[Chorus]
Holding you, holding me
Kissing forever, we'll fall together
Holding you, holding me
Kissing forever, we'll fall together
Holding you, holding me
Kissing forever, we'll fall together
Holding you, holding me
Kissing, you're all I tasted, you're all I tasted
